preCopyScript.value:
@concat('UPDATE WS
SET R.DataloadTrackerID = DL.DataloadTrackerId 
FROM DataLoadTracker DL
JOIN Datasets_Staging WS ON WS.TenantId = DL.TenantId
where DL.TenantId = ',string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId))

@concat('UPDATE WS
SET R.DataloadTrackerID = DL.DataloadTrackerId 
FROM DataLoadTracker DL
JOIN Datasets_Staging WS ON WS.TenantId = DL.TenantId
where DL.TenantId = ',string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId))

value.value:
@if(and(and(
equals(variables('Dataset staging Status'),'Succeeded'),
equals(variables('Dataset Live Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('Dataset History Status'),'Succeeded')),
    'Succeeded','Failed')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat (
    'EXEC [dbo].[sp_ChildPipelineLog_Insert] ',
    '''', 'Started', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
    '''', convertTimeZone(utcnow(),'UTC','India Standard Time'), '''', ',',
    '''', '', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerName, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerType, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerTime, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().parameters.TenantId, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', ''''
)

activities.name: Capturing Status in WorkSpace Users Staging

value.value:
@if(and(and(and(and(
equals(variables('Get Workspaces Status'),'Succeeded'),
equals(variables('WorkspaceUsers Staging Staus'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('WorkSpaceUserLive Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('WorkSpaces Batch'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('WorkSpacesUsers History Status'),'Succeeded')),
'Succeeded','Failed')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select ReportSourceKey,WorkspaceId 
from [dbo].[Reports_batch] 
where BatchNo = ',string(pipeline().parameters.BatchNo), 
' AND TenantId = ', string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId))

value.value:
@if(and(and(and(and(

equals(variables('ReportPages Live Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('ReportPages Batch Status'),'Succeeded')),
equals(variables('ReportPages History Status'),'Succeeded')),

preCopyScript.value:
@concat('UPDATE R
SET R.DataloadTrackerID = DL.DataloadTrackerId 
FROM DataLoadTracker DL
JOIN Reports_Staging R ON R.TenantId = DL.TenantId
where DL.TenantId = ',string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId))

@concat('UPDATE WS
SET R.DataloadTrackerID = DL.DataloadTrackerId 
FROM DataLoadTracker DL
JOIN ViewReports_Staging WS ON WS.TenantId = DL.TenantId
where DL.TenantId = ',string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId))

FROM DataLoadTracker DL

equals(variables('ViewReportStaging Status'),'Succeeded'),
